verses.text: Now \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* Solomon's purpose \w to|strong="H5921"\w* put \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* house \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* house \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w himself|strong="H0376"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H0834"\w* seventy thousand \w men|strong="H0559"\w* numbered \w for|strong="H0413"\w* transport, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* eighty thousand \w for|strong="H0413"\w* cutting \w stone|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* mountains, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* three thousand, six hundred \w as|strong="H0834"\w* overseers.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Solomon sent \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Huram, \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Tyre, saying, \w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* did \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* father David, sending \w him|strong="H5921"\w* cedar-trees \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w See|strong="H0834"\w*! \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* name \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* holy \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w where|strong="H0834"\w* perfumes \w of|strong="H1004"\w* sweet spices \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* burned \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* holy bread \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* placed \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* times, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* burned \w offerings|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* offered morning \w and|strong="H0430"\w* evening, \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Sabbaths \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* new moons, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* regular feasts \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. \w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* law \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w to|strong="H0430"\w* Israel.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* great, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* greater \w than|strong="H3808"\w* all gods.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* strength \w enough|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* house \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*, seeing \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* heaven \w of|strong="H0376"\w* heavens \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H1732"\w* wide \w enough|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* resting-place? \w who|strong="H0834"\w* am \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w then|strong="H6258"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* house \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*? \w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am building \w it|strong="H3045"\w* only \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* burning \w of|strong="H0376"\w* perfume \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* expert worker \w in|strong="H5650"\w* gold \w and|strong="H7971"\w* silver \w and|strong="H7971"\w* brass \w and|strong="H7971"\w* iron? \w in|strong="H5650"\w* purple \w and|strong="H7971"\w* red \w and|strong="H7971"\w* blue, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* cutting \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w all|strong="H3045"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H5650"\w* ornament, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w be|strong="H5650"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* expert workmen \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* Judah \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* Jerusalem, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* father \w David|strong="H5973"\w* got \w together|strong="H5973"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* send \w me|strong="H0589"\w* cedar-trees, cypress-trees \w and|strong="H1004"\w* sandal-wood \w from|strong="H6086"\w* Lebanon, \w for|strong="H3588"\w*, \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* knowledge, \w your|strong="H0834"\w* servants \w are|strong="H0834"\w* expert wood-cutters \w in|strong="H1004"\w* Lebanon; \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* servants \w will|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* yours,

\w To|strong="H5414"\w* get \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* \w for|strong="H6086"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* great numbers, \w for|strong="H6086"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* house \w which|strong="H6086"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* am building \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* great \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H3772"\w* wonder.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* food \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* servants, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* wood-cutters, twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* barley \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* wine \w and|strong="H3068"\w* twenty thousand measures \w of|strong="H4428"\w* oil.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Tyre, \w sent|strong="H5414"\w* Solomon \w an|strong="H1129"\w* \w answer|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* writing, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Because|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* love \w for|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w Huram|strong="H2361"\w* said, Praise \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* Lord, \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w God|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Israel, maker \w of|strong="H0376"\w* heaven \w and|strong="H7971"\w* earth, \w who|strong="H0376"\w* \w has|strong="H0376"\w* given \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w David|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* king \w a|strong="H7971"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H2450"\w*, full \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* good sense, \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* builder \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* house \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* Lord \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* house \w for|strong="H7971"\w* \w himself|strong="H3045"\w* \w as|strong="H0376"\w* king.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w now|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* am sending \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w expert|strong="H0376"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, Huram \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*,

\w The|strong="H0559"\w* son \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* woman \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* daughters \w of|strong="H5650"\w* Dan, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* father \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* man \w of|strong="H5650"\w* Tyre, \w an|strong="H7971"\w* expert worker \w in|strong="H5650"\w* gold \w and|strong="H7971"\w* silver \w and|strong="H7971"\w* brass \w and|strong="H7971"\w* iron, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w stone|strong="H0834"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* wood, \w in|strong="H5650"\w* purple \w and|strong="H7971"\w* blue \w and|strong="H7971"\w* fair linen \w and|strong="H7971"\w* red, trained \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* cutting \w of|strong="H5650"\w* every sort \w of|strong="H5650"\w* ornament \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* invention \w of|strong="H5650"\w* every sort \w of|strong="H5650"\w* design; \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w be|strong="H0113"\w* \w given|strong="H5650"\w* \w a|strong="H7971"\w* place among \w your|strong="H0834"\w* expert workmen \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w those|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*, \w your|strong="H0834"\w* father \w David|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w now|strong="H0935"\w* let \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w send|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* servants \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w grain|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* oil \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* wine \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w has|strong="H3605"\w* said;

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* wood cut \w from|strong="H0376"\w* Lebanon, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w much|strong="H0834"\w* \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w need|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* send \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w on|strong="H0776"\w* flat boats \w by|strong="H3478"\w* sea \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Joppa, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w there|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* take \w it|strong="H0834"\w* \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Jerusalem.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* Solomon \w took|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* number \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w all|strong="H0505"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H2022"\w* strange lands \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* living \w in|strong="H0505"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*, \w as|strong="H1992"\w* \w his|strong="H5647"\w* father David \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*; \w there|strong="H2022"\w* \w were|strong="H1992"\w* \w a|strong="H2672"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* fifty-three \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.
Seventy thousand he put to the work of transport, eighty thousand to cutting stone in the mountains, and three thousand, six hundred as overseers to put the people to work.
